items.title: 'Best of our country': Australian PM visits Bondi hero in hospital
items.description: "Your heart is strong", Anthony Albanese tells the father-of-two, calling him "a true Australian hero".

items.title: French court sentences ex-DR Congo rebel and politician to 30 years in jail
items.description: In a landmark trial, Roger Lumbala faced accusations about atrocities committed during the Second Congo war.

items.title: Who are the Bondi shooting victims?
items.description: Authorities say two rabbis, a Holocaust survivor and a 10-year-old girl were among the victims.

items.title: Dashcam video shows couple trying to stop gunman before being killed in Bondi attack
items.description: Boris Gurman, 69, "charged straight towards the danger" and grabbed one of the attacker's guns, a witness says.

items.title: Rob Reiner's son Nick arrested on suspicion of murder after director and wife found dead
items.description: The couple's son is in custody after the couple was found dead in their home on Sunday.
